thread.title: Trump Pledges To Fight 'Bigotry,' Praises Own Win At Black History Museum
thread.title_full: Trump Pledges To Fight 'Bigotry,' Praises Own Win At Black History Museum

author: Esme Cribb
title: Trump Pledges To Fight 'Bigotry,' Praises Own Win At Black History Museum
text:
President Donald Trump pledged on Tuesday to fight "bigotry, intolerance and hatred" and thanked states where he "won by double, double, double digits" during an impromptu speech at the Smithsonian National Museum of African-American History and Culture.
Read More â†’
